issue.title: TPC-H Data Generator Node
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15654](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15654). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To aid with benchmarking and profiling the engine on TPC-H, I'd like to build an arrow-native TPC-H data generator scan node, and then later implement exec plans for each TPC-H query in a benchmark program.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15654?focusedCommentId=17490418) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
ARROW-3998 also exists and has some discussion there — any reason to not use that to track this work? I'm happy to do the jira work to make that happen if we want to track it there, of course!

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15654?focusedCommentId=17499816) by Sasha Krassovsky (sakras):*
That's a good point, we can move it to that one. I can close this issue.
